    • Constructor Detail

      • Circle

        public Circle()
        Creates a circle with the center at (0, 0) and radius 0, filled in with black and with a black stroke

      • Circle

        public Circle(double x,
              double y,
              double radius,
              int strokeWeight,
              java.awt.Color c,
              boolean hasFill,
              java.awt.Color s,
              boolean hasStroke)
        Creates a circle with the center at (x, y) and specified radius and stroke weight
        Parameters:
        x - the x coordinate of the center
        y - the y coordinate of the center
        radius - the radius of the circle
        strokeWeight - the weight of the stroke of the circle
        c - color of the fill of the shape
        hasFill - whether the shape should have a fill
        s - color of the stroke of the shape
        hasStroke - whether the shape should have a stroke

      • draw

        public void draw(processing.core.PApplet marker)
        Draws the circle with the center at (x, y) and with the specified radius and stroke weight
        Overrides:
        draw in class Shape
        Parameters:
        marker - A PApplet object used to draw the circle
        Precondition:
        marker settings (beside ellipseMode and strokeWeight) that are applied beforehand will affect this circle
        Postcondition:
        marker will have all the previously set settings except ellipseMode and strokeWeight: ellipseMode will be in center mode and strokeWeight will be the specified value

        Postcondition:
        changes the radius of the circle to the new value
